grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 凍結【トウケツ】freezing (e.g. water), freezing (prices, wages, assets, etc.), moratorium, suspension (e.g. investment)
凍死【トウシ】death from cold, freezing to death
解凍【カイトウ】thaw, defrosting, decompression (e.g. of a file), unpacking, extracting, unzipping
自動解凍【ジドウカイトウ】self-extracting (file)
kun reading compounds: 凍る【こおる】to freeze, to be frozen over, to congeal
凍える【こごえる】to freeze (of one's body), to be frozen, to become numb (with cold), to be chilled
凍てる【いてる】to freeze, to freeze over
凍みる【しみる】to freeze, to be frozen over, to congeal
